message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $70. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. I'll sell the product to you for $82.50.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Can you try to meet me at $75?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $81.50.
I'm still not convinced. Can you try to meet me at $78?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob! I'll sell the product to you for $80.50.
I'm getting close to buying from John, but I'll give you one more chance. Can you meet me at $80?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. This is my final offer: I'll sell the product to you for $80.25.
